JAIPUR : Chief minister Vasundhara Raje 's cabinet expansion might give a miss to senior BJP legislator Pratap Singh Singhvi with the Lokayukta having indicted him .
Singhvi has been found guilty by the Lokayukta in an allotment of a Rajasthan Housing Board ( RHB ) property to Suryakanta Vyas , senior BJP legislator from Soorsagar in Jodhpur .
The Lokayukta has sent a copy of its report to Raje and asked her to keep in mind before entrusting Singhvi with any important responsibility .
The Lokayukta has sent a copy of its report to Raje and asked her to keep in mind before entrusting Singhvi with any important responsibility .
The preliminary inquiry report of Lokayukta had concluded gross irregularity in allotment of a RHB property in the name of Vyas .
By a conspiracy , Vyas was granted 50 % rebate on the total cost of Rs 33,11,631 of which she had to pay only Rs 17,51,003 causing a loss to the state exchequer .
